feedback_summary: Good story, well-suited for the target age. Could have a clearer moral.

detailed_feedback.clarity: The plot was easy to follow.
detailed_feedback.character_development: Characters were likable but could have more depth.

suggested_improvements: Consider adding a more explicit moral to the story.
Develop the main character's motivations further.

feedback_summary: The addition of the new character improved engagement.

detailed_feedback.character_interaction: The new character integrated well with existing elements.

suggested_improvements: Explore the new character's backstory a bit more.
